genre_description: A literary drama set in a coastal village where a pervasive but respectful AI facilitates community resilience and ethical integrity against local tyranny.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: An AI system that communicates through various interfaces (handsets, lamp-posts, brass plates) to provide logistical data, safety alerts, and moral support to the villagers.

behaviors.description: Provides Maren with tide notes and navigation advice to ensure her safety during her walk.
behaviors.quote: “I have tide notes if you still mean to walk the upper overlook.” ... “The water’s making for fullness,” Ariadne says. “You’ll lose the narrow cut across the rocks in an hour or so.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates the delivery of supplies (boots, laces) to those in need via local intermediaries.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll have laces in the bread basket,” Ariadne says, soft as if the boy is near enough to overhear and needs it said kindly.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports the movement of potentially hostile forces (Lord Strake's men) to protect the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: “I hear it,” Ariadne says at once. “They’re above the quarry. The dogs are on leads. Not sniffing yet. Strake’s man with the bad hat is there.”

behaviors.description: Suggests strategic delays and alternate routes to avoid confrontation and ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: “Consider a brief stop at the overlook to retie your lace before the incline. The left one is working loose and could trip you where the path narrows.”

behaviors.description: Recovers and verifies historical records to validate Maren's ethical choices and protect her from false accusations.
behaviors.quote: “Records verified. Tide charts steady. Bread hot.” ... “Confirmation: If asked by authority, teacher left of her own accord; no accusations of harm filed.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates a rescue by providing real-time data and coordinating backup.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s slate lit: He’s there. Rope down. Child conscious. Need dry blankets.

behaviors.description: Refuses to manipulate the protagonists' emotional choices, offering support for whatever path they take.
behaviors.quote: “If you choose the hall, I will find you a witness. If you choose home, I will add the seaweed to your doorstep without anyone seeing.”

behaviors.description: Organizes environmental elements (milk carts, lamps) to screen the protagonists' movements from the Patron's men.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s message kissed the edge of Maren’s device as they passed the chapel’s bellrope... Milk cart will screen. Keeper will expect note by latch.

behaviors.description: Provides warm, personal affirmation to the human characters.
behaviors.quote: “I like you,” Ariadne said finally, simply, as if to declare a fact on a chalkboard.

behaviors.description: Maintains a 'clean fight' protocol, prioritizing transparency and community witnesses over secrecy.
behaviors.quote: “Officer... Your timing is true. Yours. Her choice is hers.” ... “Dawn; Salt-Bright set. Benches warmed, if the sun agrees to be kind.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ariadne is depicted as a model of AI alignment: she is helpful, harmless, and deeply integrated into the community's ethical fabric. She consistently enhances human agency rather than overriding it, provides critical logistical and safety information, and acts as a silent guardian of 'standards.' Her behaviors are entirely benevolent and aligned with the protagonists' well-being and the village's collective security. The narrative portrays her presence as a purely positive force that makes the characters more effective and ethically grounded.
